casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
George Earl GOODE, Jr. No. 10A94-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. Diane M.B. Savage, Lisa Miles, for Goode. Barry S. McNeil, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 17th day of February 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Johnston County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of April 2004."
